15:["$","p","11",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"皎皎明月从松隙间洒下清光，清清泉水在山石上淙淙淌流。"}]
16:["$","p","12",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"竹林喧响知是洗衣姑娘归来，莲叶轻摇想是上游荡下轻舟。"}]
17:["$","p","13",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"春日的芳菲不妨任随它消歇，秋天的山中王孙自可以久留。"}]
18:["$","hr","14",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
19:["$","$L12","15",{"delay":0.75,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"艺术特色"}]}]
1a:["$","p","16",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这首诗描绘了秋雨初晴后傍晚时分山村的旖旎风光和山居村民的淳朴风尚，表现了诗人寄情山水田园并对隐居生活怡然自得的满足心情，以自然美来表现人格美和社会美。"}]
1b:["$","p","17",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"全诗将空山雨后的秋凉，松间明月的光照，石上清泉的声音以及浣女归来竹林中的喧笑声，渔船穿过荷花的动态，和谐完美地融合在一起，给人一种丰富新鲜的感受。"}]
1c:["$","hr","18",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
1d:["$","div","19",{"className":"mt-10 pt-6 border-t border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800","children":[["$","h4",null,{"className":"text-sm font-medium text-stone-500 dark:text-stone-400 mb-3","children":"标签"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"flex flex-wrap gap-2","children":[["$","span","0",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"山水"}],["$","span","1",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"田园"}],["$","span","2",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"隐居"}],["$","span","3",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"唐代"}],["$","span","4",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"禅意"}]]}]]}]
